wikipedia_page.main: Ofo Uhiara (born 13 December 1975) was born in the UK of Nigerian descent and grew up in east London. He is an actor most noted for his role as Police Constable Lance Powell in the ITV soap opera The Bill. He is the brother of actress Ony Uhiara.

She was born in the UK of Nigerian descent and grew up in east London. Ony is the sister of Ofo Uhiara, best known for his role as PC Lance Powell in The Bill.  In 2002, Ony graduated from the Guildhall School of Music and Drama.
